response.original_title: Us the Duo: Christmas Live in LA
response.overview: In the winter of 2017, Us the Duo played their largest sold-out show to date at the ACE Theater in Los Angeles. The result is this full length concert film, where they performed songs in both duo and band formats, from their Amazon Original holiday album Our Favorite Time of Year that features old favorites and new holiday originals to celebrate the holiday season.
response.title: Us the Duo: Christmas Live in LA
